name: Chronicles of Chicken
description:
A curious adventurer is transformed into a chicken, and must now escape the wizard's tower. Complete each level in one go, because once you set off on your journey, you lose all control. Up to three times each level, control can be taken back to change course, but choose wisely because those chances are all you're going to get to outrun the hungry wizard.

Use arrow keys to issue commands, space keys issues a wait command.

Left or right ctrl key starts movement, or stops it if already moving (once each level).

Avoid spiders, pools of poison, flames and bullets as you traverse the mighty wizard's domain.

Art by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Music by www.bensound.com
